courses.title: Culinary Foundations
courses.description: Master the basics of cooking techniques and foundational skills every chef needs.

courses.title: Baking and Pastry Arts
courses.description: Learn the art of baking and pastry creation with guidance from professional pastry chefs.

courses.title: Advanced Knife Skills
courses.description: Take your knife skills to the next level with advanced techniques for precision and speed.

courses.title: World Cuisines
courses.description: Explore flavors and techniques from cuisines around the world in this comprehensive course.

courses.title: Gourmet Sauces and Stocks
courses.description: Learn to make rich and flavorful sauces and stocks to elevate your dishes.

courses.title: Food Plating and Presentation
courses.description: Discover techniques for beautiful food presentation to make your dishes look as good as they taste.

courses.title: Farm-to-Table Cooking
courses.description: Learn to cook using fresh, seasonal ingredients with a focus on sustainability.

courses.title: Molecular Gastronomy
courses.description: Experiment with molecular techniques to transform ingredients in exciting ways.

courses.title: History of Culinary Arts
courses.description: Trace the evolution of cooking and culinary techniques from ancient times to today.

courses.title: Mastering BBQ and Grill Techniques
courses.description: Learn the secrets to perfect grilling and barbecue for mouth-watering results.
